title: Back in the U.S. & Not Too Early to Say That...
itunes:title: Back in the U.S. & Not Too Early to Say That...
description:
In a room filled with heroes – Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Marc Sessler & Chris Wesseling – react to being back on home soil (:30)! The heroes discuss Bills’ rookie Josh Allen being named the Week 2 starter (8:50), Aaron Rodgers’ health (16:00), Corey Coleman signing with the Patriots (20:30), the implications of Hurricane Florence on NFL games (25:50) and Wess’s take on NFL Player of the Week honors (30:00). Following the news, the heroes delve into a new segment ‘Not Too Early to Say That…’(44:50), including – is this the start of a new era for the Jets (49:00) and the devastating Myles Garrett/Denzel Ward combo in Cleveland (57:00).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
